products.name: Solara Lux
products.about: It is a young, 'Proto-Giant' star, with a lifespan of approximately 80 billion years. It is currently in its early, intensely bright phase.
products.elements: Primarily composed of Helium-3, with traces of a theoretical 'chronium' element that affects the flow of time around it.
products.size: 5 times the diameter of our Sun

products.name: Umbra Noctis
products.about: A 'Dwarf-Remnant,'' it is in the final stages of a 100-trillion-year lifespan. It is slowly collapsing.
products.elements: Primarily composed of dark matter and a high concentration of exotic particles known as 'duskons'.
products.size: 1.2 times the size of the Sun

products.name: Aegis Borealis
products.about: A 'Metallic-Core' star, approximately 12 billion years old, in a stable, middle-age phase.
products.elements: Composed of a balanced mix of heavy elements like iron, nickel, and an incredibly dense metallic hydrogen.
products.size: 2.5 times the size of the Sun

products.name: Lumina Ignis
products.about: A 'Silicon-Dwarf' star, it has a short but intense life of only 50 million years.
products.elements: Composed of a super-heated plasma of pure, ionized silicon.
products.size: 0.7 times the size of the Sun

products.name: Echo Solus
products.about: A 'Matter-Antimatter' star, it is in a constant state of controlled annihilation. Its life is short, but intensely energetic.
products.elements: Primarily composed of antimatter, with a small amount of regular matter forming a thin, outer shell.
products.size: 1.5 times the size of the Sun

products.name: Genesis Spora
products.about: A 'Maternal-Class' star. It is a proto-star that is constantly 'birthing' smaller, new stars. Its lifespan is indefinite
products.elements: A primordial mix of hydrogen, helium, and a theoretical 'genesis' particle that can self-replicate and create new matter.
products.size: The main core is 4 times the diameter of our Sun, but the entire 'spore' can extend for several light-years.
